title: Neutra Face: An Ode to a Typeface Music Video
content:
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHCu28bfxSI](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820004015/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHCu28bfxSI "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHCu28bfxSI")

Interesting take on Lady Gaga's "Poker Face" with a little inspiration from Neutraface.
author: AndrewSipe

comments.content:
Also covered in this other thread:

[http://typophile.com/node/64939](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820004015/http:/typophile.com/node/64939 "http://typophile.com/node/64939")

But I like the title of _your_ thread a lot more. :-)

That explains why I wasn't able to find it when I did a search. I'm not a fan of double posting unnecessarily. This was just a matter of how why better titling is needed.

- [andrewsipe.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820004015/http:/www.andrewsipe.com/)
